questions.question: 1. How does the diode bridge rectifier differ from the half-wave bridge rectifier?

answers.a: Diode bridge uses four diodes and half-wave rectifier uses two diodes
answers.b: Diode bridge rectifier has higher efficiency
answers.c: Diode bridge rectifier produces a smoother output

questions.question: 2. Which component in an RL-load helps to oppose sudden change in current?
3. Which of the following devices is more suitable for forming an uncontrolled rectifier?
4. What is the primary function of a LC- low-pass filter in a diode bridge rectifier circuit?

answers.a: To convert AC voltage to DC voltage

questions.question: 5. What change do we observe when diode rectifier is connected with RL-load instead of R-load?

answers.c: The input and output current has less distortion with RL-load
answers.d: Less distortion in input current only with RL-load
